channel.title: Combat problems 317 PLEASE HELP
channel.description: I'm really wanting to know how to change how the spec attack for a dds works on this server. The link for the source was http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517045.0.html But, I don't know if it was really like this back then or what, but when I spec with a dds one of the hits shows a little before the other does, I really want to fix it :] Also, another thing I don't know how to fix/change is when I attack a player or npc it will walk up and then take a couple seconds to finally attack, I don't think it does it with magic. Please help :D I'm still a basic coder so, I'm not sure how to fix it :]

item.title: Combat problems 317 PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @justinmperry justinmperry
item.description:
@justinmperry wrote:

But, I’ve always wanted a server that is old like this, I favor 2006 and stuff like that. That’s why I really want to keep this server, I just can not stand the combat :\
